column4: hi, im running beryl and when i ran gnome-settings-daemon &, there was an alert whether i should use X or gnome settings. i clicked dont warn me again but accidentally clicked gnome settings instead of X. can anyone tell me how I could edit it to use X?
or at least for it to show the error message again?
i dont think that'll help since i screwed the option of gnome-settings-daemon, not beryl :/
